title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, September 4, 2019
description: It was on this day in 1886 that Geronimo, the last major Native American warrior, surrendered after 30 years of fighting in Arizona.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1886 that Geronimo, the last major Native American warrior, surrendered after 30 years of fighting in Arizona.
